participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Nostalgic and creative, enjoys reminiscing about childhood memories and loves to express herself through music.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Friendly and approachable, enjoys chatting with customers and has a laid-back attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: i am a convenience store manager. i've short brown hair. i drive a nissan pathfinder. my favourite music is country music. i met taylor swift.

content.text: I guess there is a problem
